name: Uther
title: The Lightbringer
description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

abilities.name: Holy Light
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 362 Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 181 Health.

abilities.name: Holy Radiance
abilities.description: Heal all allies in a line for 177 Health, dealing 177 damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Hammer of Justice
abilities.description: Deal 109 damage and Stun the target for 0.75 seconds.

heroics.name: Divine Shield
heroics.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

heroics.name: Divine Storm
heroics.description: Deal 170 damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

original.name: Uther
original.title: The Lightbringer
original.description: The first paladin and founder of the Order of the Silver Hand, Uther the Lightbringer is a faithful servant of the Light. Dispensing justice with the swing of his hammer, Uther is a bastion of truth and an unflinching symbol of the Alliance.
original.shortDescription: A Healer that can negate high bursts of damage.

baseHeroInfo.name: Uther
baseHeroInfo.title: The Lightbringer
baseHeroInfo.description: The first paladin and founder of the Order of the Silver Hand, Uther the Lightbringer is a faithful servant of the Light. Dispensing justice with the swing of his hammer, Uther is a bastion of truth and an unflinching symbol of the Alliance.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Healer that can negate high bursts of damage.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

trait.name: Devotion, Eternal Vanguard
trait.description: Heroes healed by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 15 Armor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself. Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

abilities.name: Holy Light
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 362 Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 181 Health.

abilities.name: Holy Radiance
abilities.description: Heal all allies in a line for 177 Health, dealing 177 damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Hammer of Justice
abilities.description: Deal 109 damage and Stun the target for 0.75 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Divine Shield
heroicAbilities.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Divine Storm
heroicAbilities.description: Deal 170 damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

otherAbilities.name: Holy Light
otherAbilities.description: Heal target ally for 362 Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 181 Health.

otherAbilities.name: Hand of Protection
otherAbilities.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

skins.name: The Lightbringer
skins.description: The first paladin and founder of the Order of the Silver Hand, Uther the Lightbringer is a faithful servant of the Light. Dispensing justice with the swing of his hammer, Uther is a bastion of truth and an unflinching symbol of the Alliance.

skins.name: Grand Marshal Uther
skins.description: It's common for the longest serving paladins in the Alliance to still wear their Grand Marshal's Aegis with pride. After all, it takes a lot of honorable kills to purchase that thing.

skins.name: Judgment Uther
skins.description: Despite surviving Arthas's brutal assault, Uther was unable to prevent Lordaeron's fall. Now under Varian's banner he leads the Silver Hand into Northrend to mete out justice.

skins.name: Medic Uther
skins.description: It is said any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. Medical Corps officer Uther Lightbringer tends to agree.

skins.name: Lumberjack Uther
skins.description: Arthur Light of British Columbia had barely sipped his coffee when he was dragged into a Nexus portal. Now, he fights alongside the greatest of heroes, hoping to find a way home.
